title: Report Templates
description: Create reusable templates to generate reports in one click
connectRequired: Connect Google Ads to create templates
sessionExpiredDescription: Unable to retrieve your Google Ads accounts. The session has likely expired. Reconnect account

empty.title: No templates
empty.noTemplates: Create your first template to generate reports quickly

accountSelector.title: Select an account
accountSelector.description: This template doesn't specify a Google Ads account. Please select one to generate the report.

delete.title: Delete template
delete.confirmSimple: Are you sure you want to delete the template "{name}"? This action is irreversible.
delete.confirmWithSchedules: This template is used by {count} schedule(s) ({activeCount} active): {names} and {remaining} others.
delete.warning: If you delete this template, THESE SCHEDULES WILL ALSO BE DELETED.
delete.confirmQuestion: Are you sure you want to continue?
